title: Hugs & Cups
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small art cafe situated in Alpine Sports Center. Serves daily soup, sandwiches, smoothies, cakes, salads (mostly vegan and vegetarian, but sells sandwiches with meat products as well). Has soy milk for coffee. The owner is vegetarian, very friendly and knows everything about veganism.
